text: hectimetables R package aiming creating possible timetables Business Analytics track Master Management University Lausanne (HEC), year 2020-2022.

title: HEC timetable creation - functions for ShinyApp
text: end production shinyApp, can access R running hectimetables::runDemo() online, hosted shinyapps.io website. Available interest user set functions used ShinyApp: dummy_creation(): function create matrix constraints used perform binary optimisation classes select , depending many total credits student aim pass given semester, many core elective credits /wants, well half-days moment /want class (Monday Friday, PM) class_optim(): function takes preferences user ShinyApp makes possible matrix constraints display_text_timetable() display_visual_timetable(): two functions generate nice table well visual containing classes take
